title: Slow Client Download
body: I have been attempting to download the update from the client but it is telling me that it is going to take 700+ minutes. I know my connection is not an issue. Are there any settings that I am missing?

replies.body: So I uninstalled the Client, then reinstalled, and that seemed to fix the issue.

Hmmmmm we don't really have a way to force the download to speed up at all, but I would suggest going through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if any of those steps help smooth out your connection enough to speed up the patch!
